game.name: Polygoneer
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: POLYGONEER에서 반사 신경을 테스트하고, 사방에서 오는 prolygonal 모양으로부터 자신을 방어하고, 때리는 것만으로는 충분하지 않습니다. 도전할 준비가 되셨습니까?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Test your reflexes in POLYGONEER, defend yourself from prolygonal shapes taht comes from everywhere, just hitting is not enough you need to match the right color shot to the polygon too! Are you ready for the challenge?
